mapper.insert: insert into style_reply ( sid, member_email, post_id, content, parent_id, depth) values(seq_style_reply.NEXTVAL, #{member_email}, #{post_id}, #{content},#{parent_id}, #{depth})
mapper.select: select * from style_reply where post_id = #{post_id} order by regdate asc
select * from style_reply where post_id = #{post_id} and parent_id = 0 order by regdate asc
select * from style_reply where post_id = #{post_id} and parent_id != 0 and depth = #{depth} order by regdate asc
